extension.name: xDownloader alpha
extension.author: xrbyte
extension.description:
xDownloader alpha plugin for Joomla!

Created to hide direct links on downloadable files.

Convert plugin key to the url link in content to download file.

Key syntax: {xdownloader title=[]|groups=[,]|filename=[]|filepath=[]}.

Key variables separate by '|'.

Variable 'title': optional variable, will be change on the 'filename' variable or file name from 'filepath' variable if 'title' empty or absent from key.

Variable 'groups': optional variable, using to set permission on downloads. Value is the name of groups separate by ','.

Variable 'filename': optional variable, set the name of downloadable file, possibly to use different name of original file name.

Variable 'filepath': necessary variable, must be full path of file on the server.

Example: Some article content text {xdownloader title=Banana|groups=Registered,Author,Publisher|filename=bananas.jpg|filepath=/etc/www/images/sampledata/fruitshop/bananas_2.jpg}

Plugin require installed xDownloader alpha or beta versions of components to correct work.
